Function.Description: The left function returns a specied number of characters from a Text or String argument starting from the leftmost character.

Brief.Overview: The left function returns a specified number of characters from a Text or String argument, beginning at the leftmost character.
Brief.Usage: The left function is used to create a substring of a specified length starting from the leftmost character in a String or Text.

Argument.Name: length
Argument.Note: A positive integer representing the number of characters to return.

Syntax.Return: The substring of length {length} starting from the leftmost character
